root.name: Jill of the Jungle
root.description: OverviewJill of the Jungle was the second game released by Epic Games (then called Epic MegaGames). Its development was funded from the sales of their first game, ZZT. Jill of the Jungle was a three-part series consisting of:Jill of the JungleJill of the Jungle: Jill Goes UndergroundJill of the Jungle: Jill Saves the PrinceThe first game in the series was released freely as shareware.
